message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $75. Would you be willing to accept that price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, but I'm not sure I can go as low as $75. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $85, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant at $85. I'm willing to pay $80 for the product, would you be willing to accept that price?
